pages.title: Ocean of Consciousness
pages.text: $(key)Ocean of Consciousness$() is a world of nothingness.$(br2)Once you enter, your $(mechanic/hostility)Hostility extra difficulty$() will permanently increase by 100 levels.$(br2)You cannot use Waystones to travel in or out of the Ocean of Consciousness. The only way in is the $(key)Magic Mirror$(), and the only way out is the $(key)Consciousness Pivot$().

pages.title: Consciousness Pivot
pages.text: $(key)Consciousness Pivots$() are scattered across the surface of the Ocean of Consciousness. Right-click the $(key)Consciousness Core$() on top to $(bold)activate$() the pivot and trigger an $(key)Invasion Event$(). Mobs will spawn in waves and attack the player; defeat them all to gain special rewards.$(br2)The higher the pivot's difficulty coefficient and the more $(key)Consciousness Pedestals$() it has, the harder the Invasion Event will be.

$(br)After an $(key)Invasion Event$() ends, the $(key)Consciousness Core$() will emit a beam of light. Stand in the beam to teleport back to the corresponding location in the Overworld.$(br2)An $(bold)activated$() $(key)Consciousness Pivot$() can also affect nearby $(util/storage#wireless)storage systems$(), acting similarly to a beacon.
